SELL 465,607 shares 439,246.89 € 1,604 trades It is specified that as of June 30, 2018, the following resources were listed in the liquidity account:Number of shares: 55,930Cash position: 70,478.18 €As a reminder, the liquidity agreement was initially granted with the following means:Number of shares: 0Cash position: 300,000.00 €Contacts Pixium VisionDidier LaurensChief Financial Officerinvestors@pixium-vision.com+33 1 76 21 47 68 Media relations LifeSci AdvisorsSophie Baumontsophie@lifesciadvisors.com+33 6 27 74 74 49 Investors relationLifeSci AdvisorsChris Maggoschris@lifesciadvisors.com+41 79 367 62 54  APPENDIX H2 2019   Achats Ventes
